overview: Jeffrey Nordhaus joined Quadrangle Group LLC in 2001 and is a Managing Principal focused on the firmâ€™s media and communications private equity business. Prior to joining Quadrangle, Mr. Nordhaus was a Vice President in the Communications, Media and Entertainment Group of Goldman, Sachs & Co. During his nine years at Goldman Sachs, Mr. Nordhaus worked on a broad range of M&A and financing transactions in the communications, media, and entertainment sectors. Mr. Nordhaus was previously based in Los Angeles, California and has also worked in New York and Hong Kong. Mr. Nordhaus graduated with an A.B., cum laude, in government from Harvard College.
